website_summaries.verdict: Fully featured hand-held or rifle-mounted scope delivers a tremendous value for the money.
pros: Offers competitive 384 x 288 resolution and up to 5x zoom
Gyroscope helps improve image stabilization, particularly at distance
The monocular is both Android and iOS compatible, so you can stream images to phone or tablet over WiFi
cons: Several owners have been critical of customer support

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: This my second infrared scope and is a major upgrade from my Flir 320. Once you learn the basic settings and remember to adjust the eyepiece and the objective lens, then the image comes into focus nicely. Several reviews that I had read stated that the service was not good but I had a representative write me and ask if there was any questions about my unit. I asked Mr. Oran about the updates that I was supposed to do and he checked my numbers and found that I had the latest updates installed. I wish the manual was better and explained the system operations a little better but Mr. Oran filled me in on that missing information.
customer_reviews.author: James Hunley

customer_reviews.title: Great images and awesome features.
customer_reviews.text: The feature set on this unit is amazing! I love that I can snap a picture or start recording video at the click of a button. The image is fairly impressive as well. In my opinion, it's better than some FLIRs I've used. The WIFI is a very cool feature. Anyone who has the app and WIFI password can see what the unit sees on their phone or tablet. No more handing the unit over so that they can see what you were looking at. It's a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben M

customer_reviews.title: ATN OTS-HD 384
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and this is what he says: The ATN OTS-HD 384 works as advertised. This is my first thermal scope/ camera. I took it deer hunting and while I didnt see any deer that day, I was picking out squirrels at 75-100 yards. The squirrels showed up as pink dots so no definition but I had no idea the squirrels were there until I spotted them in the scope. I did become familiar with all controls before going to the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Love my ATN products
customer_reviews.text: I didnt mean to order the monocular, I needed the scope but I love ATN products. The THOR was my third ATN product. I love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve phillips

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: ATN OTS-HD 384 SERIES firmware update is not available on update instructions page
customer_reviews.author: KOFU YEN

customer_reviews.title: A Great Thermal Monocular, but...
customer_reviews.text: This $1,949.00 Thermal monocular comes complete with all the must-have features, including video, thermal, picture and video mode, ranging, etc. However, during my first night hunt for coyotes tonight, the hunt lasted LESS THAN 2hours! I burned through two new sets of 4 batteries each in only 1.5 hours! One set included 4 new Energizer Max batteries and the other included 4 new Energizer Ultimate Lithium batteries. I write this review so you know what to expect when going afield. And don’t even think about using rechargeable batteries, as they will tank twice as fast. I’m debating whether I’m willing to carry an external battery bank...
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Larry Mixon

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with this product, bought it for night hunts and found the zoom too grainy, the screen periodically gets a horizontal line through it. The distance marker is not accurate even after setting it up. The unit tends to shut off with no warning.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Luka

customer_reviews.title: Best scope for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to harvest feral hogs, product set up was as simple as following the instructions in the manual. Zero targeting made for a short set up! Bluetooth to phone allowed for hours of hunting. The 20k ma battery is a must for hunting times longer than 4 hours. Bought this item on a low budget, and it has proven it’s worth for an annual hunt.
customer_reviews.author: FaneFive

customer_reviews.title: easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: High refresh rate & viewing distance! Crisp image even on the biggest distances so i can count all them points im about to take! the weight is typical for this style but very manageable. Smooth zoom feature.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been a thermal owner for while now, but just recently began using ATN products for all things thermal. I am ecstatic to say that I’ve discovered THE premier thermal optics manufacturer out there. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great for hog hunting!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best purchase I have made for hog hunting. Have had for about 2 years without an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and understand
customer_reviews.text: Easy easy product to use! Great user face and the definition it flawless. I would recommend this if your looking to start out simple in the thermal area
customer_reviews.author: JASON JOHANNES

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Thermal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome thermal for the money. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler glasgow

product_meta.title: ATN OTS-HD 384 Thermal Smart HD Monoculars/Viewers w/ High Res Video, Geotagging, Rangefinder, WiFi, E-Compass, E-Zoom, 3D Gyroscope, IOS & Android Apps
product_meta.description:
Why the need for the best thermal digital monocular? It’s of course because you can pick up any heat signature, in any weather condition, day or night! ATN’s OTS-HD is a thermal imager that can allow you to see minute differences in heat on a screen, letting you see through smoke and debris or quickly find hogs even in a farmer’s fields. These night vision monocular can even be an effective tool for quick surveillance needs, because they work equally well in the day and night.

 * Thermal Sensor with 640*480 pixel HD resolution - the powerful thermal sensor gives the ability to catch heat signatures and let you see clearly in total darkness.
 * Smart Rangefinder - thermal monocular accurately measures precise distances to a subject using built-in rangefinder.
 * 3D Gyroscope and E-compass - gyroscopic image stabilization reduces natural hand shake and provides clear, sharp images. E-compass helps to navigate your way.
 * E-Zoom - this enables the device to focus on distant objects with clarity.
 * High Resolution Video Recording & Photos, Wi-Fi Streaming - allow you to record and stream video, share pictures from your hunting trip with friends. Firmware upgradeable.

Now, grab the latest OTS-HD Obsidian Core thermal monocular, with the fastest and most powerful processor around, lightning fast speed and lag-free performance. Then, set off on that deep woods adventure! What are you waiting for?
